articles.author: Abhishek Mukherjee
articles.title: Australia Name Steve Smith As Opener, Include Cam Green In XI For West Indies Test | AUS Vs WI - Wisden
articles.description: Australia have named Steve Smith as an opener for the first Test match against the West Indies, to begin on January 17 at the Adelaide Oval.
articles.content:
Australia have named Steve Smith as an opener for the first Test match against the West Indies, to begin on January 17 at the Adelaide Oval.
The West Indies will play two Test matches in Australia, … [+2056 chars]
